title: Putumayo presents: Reggae Around the World (1998)
description:
Jamaican reggae has influenced popular music around the world, Ã¢â‚¬Å“Putumayo presents: Reggae Around the WorldÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (1998) will take you on a jamminÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ global musical journey.  

This compilation charts the effect of that influence, and the way it appears, either undiluted or in hybridized form, in music from Africa, Australia, South America, and the U.S. The inclusion of pureblood reggae artists like Burning Spear and Ernest Ranglin keeps the original torch burning, but the real treat is in hearing how reggae is incorporated into songs from Nigeria, Ghana, Brazil, and elsewhere. 

Like most Putumayo releases, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s bright, groove-centric, and eminently listenable.
